paper_abstract: The stabilization of continuous-time Takagi-Sugeno systems is studied and solved by using a non-PDC controller. First, stability conditions are derived in terms of Linear Matrix Inequalities, using a multiple Lyapunov function; then, algorithms to calculate controllers that ensure closed-loop stability are derived. To show the applicability of the proposed approach, some examples are also provided.
paper_title: CONTROLLER DESIGN FOR TAKAGI-SUGENO SYSTEMS IN CONTINUOUS-TIME
